data.oai_dc:dc: A collation of the available records for rare and threatened lichens and lichenicolous fungi in England from 1700 to 2011, for purposes of conservation, future monitoring and research. Habitat and substrate information is included where available. Species are included if they are nationally rare or scarce, or have a conservation status other than least concern, data deficient or not evaluated.|To collate data on lichen distribution, changes over time and the conservation value of particular sites.|29,741 occurrences
